setRootHistoryExpiry(uint256).custom:reverts: string If the caller is not the owner.

params.expiryTime: The new amount of time it takes for a root to expire.

setRootHistoryExpiry(uint256).notice: Sets the amount of time it takes for a root in the root history to expire.
